data.message:
I am very upset that you (Facebook) converted a friends page to a "Like" page, 
thus deleting everything they have worked on for the past few years. Bikers United Disaster Relief is a family working with other survivors to give them the help they need. They are currently working on relief efforts for 5 US states and you (Facebook) deleted EVERYTHING. Im asking for you to RESTORE the page to the way it was because they ARE NOT A BUSINESS!!
